title: Cancel an Appointment
description: A patient calls to cancel their appointment for tomorrow.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the correct appointment for the patient.

tasks.description: Cancel the appointment and select a reason for cancellation (e.g., 'Patient request').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully cancels the appointment in the scheduling system.

tasks.description: Offer to reschedule the appointment for a future date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent asks the patient if they would like to find a new time.
